job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pWere working with a market leader in electronic health records EHR bases studies Partnered with world class biotechnology and pharmaceutical firms their platform runs real world evidence studies for regulatory and reimbursement purposesppbrppUtilizing data science and AI this company is looking for a Machine Learning Engineer to take ownership of the full machine learning lifecycle from data cleaning and preprocessing to deploying stateoftheart models into production ppbrppYou willpulliVerify data quality supervise the data and find available datasetsliliTrain models and tuning their hyperparametersliliDefine preprocessing and validation strategiesliliBuilds refine and productionize machine learning models liliPresent model outcomes liulpbrppbrppYou havepulliBachelors or above in Mathematics Computer Science Engineering or other related fieldliliExpertise with Python and basic libraries for machine learning pandas and scikitlearnliliExpertise with deep learning frameworksliliProficiency with scripting or other techniques for rapid data transformation and cleanupliliExpertise in visualizing and manipulating big unstructured datasetsliliExperience with cloudbased machine learning resources AWSliulpbrppbrppemBig Cloud is acting as a vendor to this position which is a direct hireemp
